root.name: Alpha Polaris
root.description: OverviewDeep into Greenland's snowfields lies Alpha Polaris, an American oil research station. High above, behind the mountains, the ion storm of the century is gathering, setting off an unexpected intermingling between reality and strange night terrors, which start to affect the research station's crew. As Rune Knudsen, a Norwegian biologist, the player has to struggle against fear and death, while trying to understand what exactly is this ominous force lurking beyond the veiled sky.
